page.title: 07Our Village Nurses.
page.content: The nurses' job in Crawford today is to help people get better and to help children to grow strong and healthy. Two nurses work in Crawford at present.They are Nurse Moffat and Nurse Park. Nursing today has many advantages. There are modern medicines and more doctors and nurses than before. The surgery used to be the nurse's cottage.Nowadays quite a few doctors come to Crawford from Douglas and Moffat.They have a lot of patients so they use the surgery as their consulting room.Surgery is held on Mondays,Wednesdays and Fridays.Nurse Moffat and Nurse Park help the doctors.They both live in Crawford but cover a much larger area as they have to visit other villages.
